teacheasy.data

Class Page

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.data.Page

  • public class Page
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the data that describes a Page as defined in the TeachEasy digital lesson XML format.
    Version:
    1.1 08 Feb 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      List of the objects on this page
